Reviews.Title: “For better or worse, you get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: teejayemm21
Reviews.Content: variety complaints bicycle hotel found exactly expected cheapest found amsterdam afforded own sleep relax days besides stay inside youre visiting amsterdam breakfast step continental decent interenet reliable bikes rent fraction cost locations city biggest downside probably shared bathroom didnt spring own heat top floor august bit evenings compared price hotels city expected

Reviews.Title: “Great value, mind the stairs”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed bicycle hotel van de pijp budget honeymoon tour europe september warmly greeted gerald romantic im specifically romantic cute comfortable purple sprang own bathroom immaculately clean characteristic hotel charming stairs wife grateful backpacks stairs shallow near vertical staircase faint heart nor bad knees breakfast morning continental plus meaning cereals pastries milk juice coffee machine toast ham nice gouda toast wide selection ate headed city explore liked bicycles available rent partake fantastic base hotel stay looking clean friendly hotel stay dont pay frills location middle close albert block trambus stops city center amsterdam centraal 510 mins depending looking stay time amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “We wanted to move after 1 night”
Reviews.Author: sulanderson
Reviews.Content: husband amsterdam 2nd anniversary selected hotel review guardian boy staff blaise completely ineffective drop bags venture arrived wasnt ready hours suppose checkin ready hour couldnt staff tried couldnt tell clean dingy little hostel hotel comforters disgusting furnished ikea furniture towels thin barely clean toilet tiny shared option shower disgusting buy flipflops hairs mildew drain clogged dirty taking shower top floor staircase steep narrow hold onto railing falling breakfast bad toaster table miserable woman slapped plate table saying staff horrible breakfast appalling bothered rent bike rained entire time didnt deal staff please dont stay nice trip move night stupidly paid front

Reviews.Title: “Great value and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: MelissaDennison
Reviews.Content: actually stayed hotel june 2009 writing review staff friendly helpful info etc basic pleasant price reasonable location close tram lines walking distance amsterdam sites id stay

Reviews.Title: “Hostel Conditions at Hotel Prices”
Reviews.Author: cjo30080
Reviews.Content: wife loved time amsterdam unfortunately paid 115 euros night private bicycle hotela equivalent normally found hostel charge half amount service whatsoever decor whatsoever towels tiny television 80s furniture appeared picked yard sale plus wifi free free continental breakfast included quiet clean location little beaten path bad folks couldnt nicer fair warning dont tell book reservation pay credit card charge percent extra cool

Reviews.Title: “Helpful, friendly, clean”
Reviews.Author: Gemrah
Reviews.Content: stayed bicycle hotel 4 nights weekend guy ran hotel friendly helpful provided map ready check wed booked double actually apartment nice surprise apartment nice clean people complained stairs steep fine breakfast nice range food plenty location 15 mins walk maybe 20 mins dam square loads trams luxury hotel value money amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Great Place- But beware of the stairs!”

Reviews.Content: bicycle hotel centre base planning day booked hostel company wasnt expecting pleasently suprised space clean inviting staff superb free internet access communal hire bikes issue couple issues stairs booked 5 stay couple booked theses happened top floor didnt bad staff handed keys stood bottom near vertical horrendous getting luggage nightmare couldnt step infront properly resort coming ballet 1st position feet outwards left hike didnt worth apart staff arrived leave bags wander helped tram system centre surrounding hotel nice lot crowded hectic amsterdam centre theres market couple streets buy short walk hotel square restaraunts day cake shop seen believed pub near bicycle hotel friendly welcoming overall stay
